parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Get the speed for the given speed mode.

SpeedMode can be:
*"AUTO"
*"SLOW"
*"NORMAL"
*"FAST"

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object '''getSpeed''' speedMode

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> speedMode: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] (m/s)

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_spd = [[player]] [[getSpeed]] "FAST";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[forceWalk]], [[isWalking]], [[forceSpeed]], [[isForcedWalk]]
</value></part></template>
